WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependency files first
COPY package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm ci

# Copy source code
COPY . .

# Build TypeScript
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM node:20-alpine

WORKDIR /app

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && \
    adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

# Copy built files from builder
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder /app/package*.json ./

# Switch to non-root user
USER appuser

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Labels
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Node.js Express API"

# Run the application

<type>file</type>
<content>1: # Frontend build stage
2: FROM node:20-alpine AS frontend-builder
3: WORKDIR /app
4: COPY frontend/package*.json ./
5: RUN npm ci && npm cache clean --force
6: COPY frontend/ ./
7: RUN npm run build
8: 
9: # Frontend production stage
10: FROM nginx:1.25-alpine AS frontend
11: LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
12: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
13: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="React frontend served by nginx"
14: COPY --from=frontend-builder /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
15: RUN addgroup --system nginxgroup && adduser --system --ingroup nginxgroup nginxuser && \
16:     chown -R nginxuser:nginxgroup /usr/share/nginx/html /var/cache/nginx /var/log/nginx /etc/nginx/conf.d && \
17:     touch /var/run/nginx.pid && chown -R nginxuser:nginxgroup /var/run/nginx.pid
18: USER nginxuser
19: EXPOSE 80
20: HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
21:     CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:80 || exit 1
22: CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
23: 
24: # API build stage
25: FROM golang:1.22-alpine AS api-builder
26: WORKDIR /app
27: COPY api/go.mod api/go.sum ./
28: RUN go mod download
29: COPY api/ ./
30: RUN CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o api ./cmd/api
31: 
32: # API production stage
33: FROM alpine:3.19 AS api
34: LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
35: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
36: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Go API server"
37: RUN apk add --no-cache ca-certificates && \
38:     addgroup --system apigroup && adduser --system --ingroup apigroup apiuser
39: WORKDIR /app
40: COPY --from=api-builder /app/api .
41: USER apiuser
42: EXPOSE 8080
43: HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
44:     CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:8080/healthz || exit 1
45: CMD ["./api"]
46: 
47: # Worker build stage
48: FROM python:3.12-slim AS worker-builder
49: WORKDIR /app
50: COPY worker/requirements.txt .
51: RUN apt-get update && \
52:     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends gcc && \
53:     pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt && \
54:     apt-get purge -y gcc && apt-get autoremove -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
55: COPY worker/ ./
56: 
57: # Worker production stage
58: FROM python:3.12-slim AS worker
59: LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
60: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
61: LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python Celery worker"
62: RUN addgroup --system workergroup && adduser --system --ingroup workergroup workeruser
63: WORKDIR /app
64: COPY --from=worker-builder /usr/local/lib/python3.12/site-packages /usr/local/lib/python3.12/site-packages
65: COPY --from=worker-builder --chown=workeruser:workergroup /app/ .
66: USER workeruser
67: HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
68:     CMD python -c "from celery import current_app; import sys; sys.exit(0 if current_app.control.ping() else 1)" || exit 1
69: CMD ["celery", "-A", "worker.app", "worker", "--loglevel=info"]

(End of file - total 69 lines)

FROM node:20-alpine AS frontend-builder
WORKDIR /app

COPY frontend/ ./
RUN npm run build

# Frontend production stage
FROM nginx:1.25-alpine AS frontend
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="React frontend served by nginx"
COPY --from=frontend-builder /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
RUN addgroup --system nginxgroup && adduser --system --ingroup nginxgroup nginxuser && \
    chown -R nginxuser:nginxgroup /usr/share/nginx/html /var/cache/nginx /var/log/nginx /etc/nginx/conf.d && \
    touch /var/run/nginx.pid && chown -R nginxuser:nginxgroup /var/run/nginx.pid
USER nginxuser
EXPOSE 80
